main

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • main.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread
    Keeps track of the robot's assumed position by using the wheel movements.
    Author:
    Scott Sewell
